derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French busard, based on Latin buteo 'falcon'

entry.def: A buzzard is a large bird of prey.
If you refer to someone as a buzzard, you think they are unpleasant or very mean.

means.word_mean: 1. common in South America and Central America and southern United States
